trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> for the background of the user picture on the **Start** menu.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPicture.Normal%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPicture> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the background of the user picture on the **Start** menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPicture.Normal%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPicture>类返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>上表示的用户图片背景**启动**菜单。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPicture.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPicture.Normal%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelUserPicture1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelUserPicture1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents the background of the user picture on the **Start** menu.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents the background of the user picture on the **Start** menu.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" />上表示的用户图片背景**启动**菜单。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPicture.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPicture.Normal%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelUserPicture1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelUserPicture1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
